adjectives.description: bulimic (comparative more bulimic, superlative most bulimic)

examples: My sister was bulimic and consequently had a number of health problems.

entries.meaning: Of, or relating to, bulimia nervosa.
examples: The woman had displayed a number of bulimic symptoms, prompting her family to stage an intervention.

entries.meaning: A person suffering from bulimia nervosa.
examples: The hospital strictly monitored the advertising materials the bulimics and anorexics were allowed to see.
